title: COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) No 2593/93 of 21 September 1993 amending Annex I to Council Regulation (EEC) No 2658/87 on the tariff and statistical nomenclature and on the Common Customs Tariff
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) No 2593/93 of 21 September 1993 amending Annex I to Council Regulation (EEC) No 2658/87 on the tariff and statistical nomenclature and on the Common Customs Tariff
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
The following Additional note shall be inserted in Chapter 22 of the combined nomenclature annexed to Regulation (EEC) No 2658/87:
'5. Only vermouth and other wine of fresh grapes flavoured with plants or aromatic substances having an actual alcoholic strength by volume of not less than 7 % vol shall be regarded as products falling within CN code 2205.'
Additional Notes 5 to 8 shall become Additional Notes 6 to 9, respectively.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the 21st day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 21 September 1993.
For the Commission
Christiane SCRIVENER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 256, 7. 9. 1987, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 180, 23. 7. 1993, p. 9.
